title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value is set in the list box of the report parameter.
EB: The default value should be set as 'aaa' in the list box of the report parameter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify the value 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. (Please provide more details in this step.)
